website_summaries.verdict: The Vizio XWR100 Dual Band HD Wireless Internet Router is arguably one of the best sub-$100 wireless routers on the market, and it's a must-have for those with network-ready home entertainment devices from Vizio.
pros: The Vizio XWR100 Dual Band HD Wireless Internet Router offers solid performance and a user-friendly Web interface
The router supports true dual-band, USB external hard drives, is easy to use, and comes in an aesthetically pleasing design
cons: The Vizio XWR100 doesn't support Gigabit Ethernet
Its network storage function can't write to external hard drives formatted in NTFS file system
The Web interface offers limited customization of its settings and features

customer_reviews.title: I would've expected more like 8 years before it started having problems
customer_reviews.text: This router served me very well for five years, but in the last few months, it started getting spotty. The number of devices connected to it increased markedly, and the network started dropping out about every half hour or so (at least under regular use). It was a shame to have to replace this after this router followed me coast to coast to coast to coast, but I replaced it last week. I would've expected more like 8 years before it started having problems, but I think I bought this with the knowledge it would likely need to be replaced on about this timeframe anyway.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Door Stopper
customer_reviews.text: Bought a used Visio XWR100 from my neighbor and tried to change SSID's (both 5 GHZ and 2.4 GHZ bands) but what happens is only the 2.4 GHZ band shows up in the network. And it's unsecured (even though I assigned a password to both) Did a factory reset and got the same results (except for the "new" VISIO ssid which displayed as an open network (unsecured) And yes my LG-G4 phone can display both 2.4 GHZ and 5.0 GHZ networks.Of which only the 2.4 GHZ open network shows up.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this after it broke and I had to replace it.... but it only broke after 5+ years. For the price, thats good enough for me. I never thought it would last forever and I'm impressed it lasted as long as it did.
customer_reviews.author: david dowe

customer_reviews.title: It Was Great While It Lasted
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 years. I don't know, seems okay. I just died a few months ago and we've replaced it with a NETGEAR that has gigabit ethernet, as well as some rack-mount gigabit switches I managed to get for free. When we got it back in 2011, it was very advanced. If VIZIO had made a new router now, we probably would have gotten it, because it's interface was so good, that it was even better than the Linksys WRT interface, and WAY better than NETGEAR's Genie. (Defiantly haven't had the NETGEAR long enough to give it a review, BTW)
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Vizio's firmware is inherently bad and you will have to power-cycle this thing a ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Wireless N Dual-Band performance. You pay for it in the long run though. Vizio's firmware is inherently bad and you will have to power-cycle this thing a lot to maintain reliability. OpenWRT makes a custom firmware package for this that makes the router MUCH more stable, but at that point the router is still an old Wireless N, 10/100 unit. Now in 2016, your money is best put into at least an N600 or higher.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie V

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I was tempted into this router because of the great price and decent reviews. Not long after I got it, it started to disconnect from my wireless devices. Usually it's when I'm using multiple devices at the same time like Xbox live gaming plus internet on my chromebook an/or phone. Sometimes it just does it randomly. I find myself having to unplug the router and plug it back in to be able and reconnect on almost a daily basis. It's ok if you need a cheap router for temporary use, but it's definitely not a router that will be reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Prickles

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set-Up and No problems!
customer_reviews.text: I installed the router a week and a half ago, and it has worked like a dream. I live in a 900 square foot apartment and have full bars everywhere I go. I have 5 main devices (Wii, Desktop Computer, iPhone, Nook, laptop) which I use wi-fi with, and they all work great. It was incredibly easy to set-up, but you do need to have internet access to configure the device. This was not a problem since my desktop computer was attached to my comcast modem already. I use my Wii all the time to watch Netflix and I also download books with my Nook frequently with no delay. It is an overall great device.
customer_reviews.author: sailorrun

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a time - not any longer!
customer_reviews.text: My Visio XWR100 worked like gangbusters for several months and then the problems started. I would lose wireless functionality and would need to power cycle or reset the device. The problem became slowly worse over time until I was having to reset the device multiple times per week. Today the unit completely crashed. No functionality either through wireless or direct connect with ethernet cables. It is completely and permanently broken. I have just ordered a new device from LinkSys.
customer_reviews.author: M. Westgate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome router, excellent range!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router based on the great reviews which significantly outweigh the negative ones. You ALWAYS risk receiving a damaged/defective item when ordering online, no matter where you order from. Anyway, these good reviews came true. This little guy cooks. I get between 70-80% signal on the other side of the house, about 60 feet away from the router. I can still get between 30-40% even down my street about 200 feet on the 2.4 GHz band, with slightly reduced range on the 5 GHz but still can get coverage through 6,500 sq. ft. house!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Holy shhhh
customer_reviews.text: Even after reading the reviews I couldn't see a $25 router from Vizio being good.Well , my Linksys E1200 is now sitting in a the box.Super easy to set up , looks good & so far works flawlessly.My Xbox is in love.Netflix is almost instant now & I have full signal in places I once had 1-2 bars.Im giving this a 4 star just because I haven't been using this router long.ill update in a few months.Ive used damn near every brand & this is by far the best under $100 router I've ever ran across.Will be ordering another for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Terrible as a "wireless" option
customer_reviews.text: I have two Vizio tvs that I thought getting the Vizio wireless router would be the most compatible. Waste of time and money. My TVs and laptop that I use wirelessly, are constantly losing the connection. I have to reset the Vizio router pretty much everyday. It caused so many issues with my TV because of the signal that Vizio replaced my TVs thinking I had defective TVs. I ended up replacing my router with a Cisco Linksys E3000 and so far it hasn't lost connection yet.
customer_reviews.author: efmb

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO XWR100 Dual-Band HD Wireless Internet Router
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this Router one(1) star but I'm too old to start "hating" anything. It's good when it works but it apparently overheats. It loses connections often and has to be disconnected from the power and the telephone line for about a minute to get it working again. I purchased it 29 December 2012 but did not connect it 'til February (Waited until I got a new television setup) I would have sent it back to Amazon but I had it more than 30 days. I intend to contact Vizio to see if they will exchange it for a better one, that is if they have a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Shellback

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works
customer_reviews.text: I've had this since early September 2012. The range has always seemed short but when I had a strong signal, I could stream Netflix, surf the internet with my phone, iPad, computer, etc with no problem. Since November 5, 2012, it has been dropping the 2.4ghz signal roughly twice per day...the 5ghz is always on. This is a problem since my Roku works on the 2.4ghz band. Since Nov. 5, I've had to unplug the router at least twice daily to get it transmit on the 2.4ghz band.
customer_reviews.author: Stéphanos

customer_reviews.title: I was delighted to find them available still new in the box ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these routers years ago when they first came out, and was sorry to see them discontinued by Vizio after only a couple of years or so. I was delighted to find them available still new in the box here on Amazon! Just purchased this one for use in another home and have had no problems whatsoever. Quick and easy setup, great connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Dan in SC

customer_reviews.title: Vizio Wireless Internet Router
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with Vizio's tech support in helping me to get the router working with my internet provider. The tech support person (from the US) stayed on the line with me and a representative from my internet provider for over an hour to help set up the router. Have not experienced any problems with the router or my internet connection.
customer_reviews.author: Grod

customer_reviews.title: I love Vizio!
customer_reviews.text: This product was on time but was told my Vizo HD TV was not compatibly! I was so sad about this as I love their products and buy Vizo when possible!!!!! I had to buy a LG blue/ray player wi-fi that lasted two weeks! Because of budget I couldn't afford wi-fi player from Vizio but I know for a fact I would have never had this problem and if I would have they would have taken it back and replaced it!!!!! Stick with Vizio as much as possible!
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money for a Quality Router -  My Vizio router is not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Locks up and needs to be started at last once a week. I replaced my old N router because my new Vizio TV would not connect to it, (but everything else did).......this is just not a reliable router. Save your money and get something that is reliable. Also, I bought the TV because I thought it was U.S. made .....but it was made in Mexico and the router in China...also found that the TV only has a G card.....I really made a mistake buying these products.
customer_reviews.author: Laker9029

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about 10 minutes - then nothing
customer_reviews.text: The router worked for about 10 minutes. Right after I finished setting up everyone's device with the new passwords for the router (10 devices in our household), it quit on me. No internet whatsoever. So, I unplugged it and plugged back in my Cisco Linksys E1000, and voila, I had internet again. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Vizio Router
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I already have one and it works OK. Both were bought from Amazon. However, I had spent a lot of time and hassle getting the thing to work despite having already used succesfully installed one. After many conversations with my i.s.p. and vizio it finally functioned. They could sure use a re-write of the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: fish 0143

customer_reviews.title: Hav
customer_reviews.text: Already have this model at home and needed an additional one for a vacation home. For some reason it does not seem to work as well at the beach as it does here. The property is smaller, so assumed it would work as well if not better.However, the vizio HGTV downstairs will not connect as it shows only one bar. The CPU connects fine and the laptop actually connects while sitting out front. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Skynyrd

customer_reviews.title: Took a risk...but VIZIO has always been a good value.
customer_reviews.text: I was really torn between this router and others. It has been solid for the last two months. I work from home 3 days a week and haven't had to reboot it yet, while running Netflix through Xbox LIVE, running applications on my laptop and having my wife do homework or listening to music on her laptop. I appreciate its subtle design and as many other users said it is really easy to setup and manage. It seems to have great range as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan P Zornes

customer_reviews.title: Handyman
customer_reviews.text: Works fine after 3 months. It replaced older Linksys,4 port plug in was not enough anymore after adding new TV,Blu-ray,Dish dvr, all internet ready stuff. Still hard wired to 3 PC's. Located it in my office area in basement corner behind furnace, and all that duct work, and wireless still works fine upstairs. Great reviews at CNET, price was excellent. Fast delivery as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman

customer_reviews.title: very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: PROS: -affordable -lightweight -easy to setup -looks good CONS: -range is a bit limited -easily susceptible to interference nice addition to my apartment. when powered up and configured, my laptop immediately saw the 2.4GHz band whereas my iPad found the 5GHz band. just had to input the relative passcodes to connect. Passcodes come on the "quick startup guide" booklet. not sure if these can be changed during config tho overall, i am very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Adrian P.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Setting up our first wireless internet was a breeze for this Grandma using the Vizio. I did have one glitch, and had to call support. The woman I spoke to was kind, efficient, easy to understand, clear in her instructions, and stayed with me until the system was working perfectly (in record time for a computer glitch). And, best of all: she was in the United States speaking clear understandable native English. (I think she was in North Dakota or someplace near there.) When ever given a choice, I'm going Vizio -- evidently they believe in customer service representatives who can communicate clearly and actually resolve problems. Totally refreshing and unique my dealings in the computer world.
customer_reviews.author: Mugwhamp

customer_reviews.title: Love Vizio products
customer_reviews.text: Not much bad I can say. The router works great, and is a huge step up from the one I previously owned. The control panel seems a little laggy and will randomly stop loading for a few minutes. Overall this was only really an issue with setting it up. Since I've set it up there has been no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: worked for a while and then stopped. I got a warranty on this but I did not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: FAIL
customer_reviews.text: Hours spent with tech support. A year wasted. This thing licks - and Vizio wouldn't do anything about it. They said the reason it failed was WALLS. Full-on BS. I purchased a MediaLink router to replace this router, and it works perfectly. Unlike the Vizio, I was able to stream an HD movie without a pause or break in the stream. Vizio tech support were nice enough, and it's great they have tech support located in this country - but the fact they wouldn't admit there was something wrong with this device is inexcusable. I think I had a quality-control issue based on how many people are so happy with it... I just got a lemon. Ah well...
customer_reviews.author: SF_Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: I never used this Router. It was not what I needed for my Tv System in the first place. It was not worth the expense to send it back so that I could get a refund, so I stuck it in the closet where it stays till this very day
customer_reviews.author: Tractor Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Very good router
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Allows you to select slow, 2.4Ghz, or 5Ghz connections. Haven't dropped a connection since I turned it on compared to my old Belkin N1 router that I had to re-boot several times a day especially when all my kids got home from school and connected wirelessly on their laptops, iTouch, phones, etc. Only complaint is how long it took to get delivered by USPS. I selected free shipping and it took 15 days for it to arrive. In the future, I'll pay a little bit more to get 2 day shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Incognitohombre

customer_reviews.title: router
customer_reviews.text: Bought it thinking I was gonna be able to use my usb harddrive as a network storage device. But nooooo it doesn't work that way. The day I picked it up from ups and set it up. Everything seemed to work fine til I notice that it doesn't have guest wifi feature and when I tried to access the external usb harddrive it says 404 not found. So it doesn't do what it claims it does therefore I'm sending it back soon.
customer_reviews.author: chris gennrich

customer_reviews.title: great unit
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this router. Had a small problem due to the fact that the security numbers in the directions were wrong. Called customer service and got the right security numbers. Like the fact that customer service is in the USA. BIG plus!
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Hamann

customer_reviews.title: Short lived....
customer_reviews.text: I bought this router because it was the top of the list for most popular buys. As far as typical routers go I'd say it's just ok and nothing too special...which is fine up until the point where it begins dropping signal every 5 seconds. It goes back to the good old saying you get what you pay for. I'm glad I didn't review this item right after buying because it would have received at least 4 stars. But junk is junk and I think even one star is to generous.
customer_reviews.author: JMattie

customer_reviews.title: Get you DSL Password
customer_reviews.text: None of the documentatiion mentions that if you have a DSL modem using PPPoE you need to know your user name (probably e-mail address) and particularly your password (assigned by your ISP). That password is not something you've set up or have ever noted but should be available in your account info. or by calling your ISP. With that password everthing is simple, straightforward and automatic. The router now works great particularly with a DVR with wireless capabilities. If I'd had that advice first I'd have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barkman

customer_reviews.title: This router can compete with any expensive dual band router
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 xbox 360 consoles connected to it, a desktop, several laptops, cellphones, and a ipod touch. And this router still runs fine. Although it is connected to an ADSL At&t modem, the speed of this router is waay better than our previous router (Netgear). I didn't want to spend too much money on a fast wireless router, thank God i found this one! Dual band, media streaming, the WORKS! It streams my netflix super fast on my xbox 360! Doesn't seem to get hot, which is a good thing. I want this router to last forever. Great product for a great overall price!
customer_reviews.author: SleazyChip

customer_reviews.title: decent price, but light on features. shaky connectivity
customer_reviews.text: pros: good price, 5ghz band connectivity, which means you'll have less interference from other wireless devices. cons: I had to reset the router about every 2-3 days until I changed the DNS settings to use OpenDNS. I haven't had to reset the router since. this shouldn't be necessary for a product that's supposed to be consumer-friendly. as others have noted, the media sharing functionality doesn't allow for saving files to the hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this router for quite a while now and am very satisfied with it. I got it from Amazon based on the good reviews and must say I wasn't disappointed. I plan on buying a repeater to increase the router range. For the price, this is a very nice router and I highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Good Easy to use Vizio Router
customer_reviews.text: A simple to setup, easy to use router. It can handle all 3 of my computers, 2 wireless printers and 3 smart phones, and there are 3 different networks you can actually have for HD TV, internet surfing and heavy downloading.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Vizio router
customer_reviews.text: This VIZIO XWR100 Dual-Band HD Wireless Internet Router was rated high and lived up to the hype. It was a little confusing at first because I did not know that both bands were password protected and I had to call Vizio. They were fast and helpful and I have had no trouble with this unit is two months.
customer_reviews.author: Lorboy!

customer_reviews.title: Works well - easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. A bit slow in transferring a movie to my smart TV, but so what.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: vizio router
customer_reviews.text: Wireless is good fast and works great with netflix but even though it is dual band i would not recommend more then 2 video streams and a computer it seems to slow down with any more then that. better then my old d-link. Update. after five months it has stopped working not happy. Now it will not show any wireless networks an wired does not work. All it does now is light up for show i guess its good. well off to buy a new router thinking of spending a little bit more. this time. will be sending it back to get replaced and will give it to a family member when i get the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: A router with two radio bands 2.4ghz and 5 ghz
customer_reviews.text: Took HOURs re-doing the firmware but I got it. OpenWrt works on it and I wanted DD-WRT but havent had the time. Same like the Radio is Good 100mw. Alot of routers i find are alot less like 25mw.
customer_reviews.author: Drewmaster74

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This router does everything it is supposed to and was easy to set up. My home computer, wireless blue ray player, and mobile phones all connect to/use this router. I have not had the usual turn off/reset issues that I used to have with my old router (different brand). Very happy with this router.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy... Customer Service SUCKS.
customer_reviews.text: The router is dual band Just for Namesake. Vizio and Vizio HD right.. Vizio HD is fluctuating. I think this product is good for just 2 months and from there on Its Luck. It may work or may not. When you call the customer care for a few times, they will offer you a "factory re certified" product in exchange. This wont be shipped untill you call them again and again. Now I dont think Vizio has customer supporting values.
customer_reviews.author: Thiru

customer_reviews.title: some good, some bad!!
customer_reviews.text: This one never worked from day one!! It was dead on arrival. The exact same model I had for over a year worked fine til a thunderstorm came by.
customer_reviews.author: TomCat

customer_reviews.title: After purchasing this I was able to watch my smart tv more
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this I was able to watch my smart tv more. I still have times when I can't get on.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: If your close enough for a cord it works great!
customer_reviews.text: setup was so/so with limited security and a complicated process for restrictions on certain devices. It is the range or strength of the signal that is most disappointing. Our Smart TV and Blu-ray player are one floor away but the connection is spotty at best and usually non existent. I bet this would be a perfect unit for a small apartment; I would not recommend it to someone needing to cover a moderately large footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Zachery Ornelas

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I expected the VIZIO to extend my signal. Well maybe it did a little, I mean a very little. I needed the signal from the modem/routher to where my service need approxamently fourty feet and through two sheetrock uninsolated walls. Did not happen. The signal increased from 50% to 68%. Not worth the money, but I'm going to use it untill I find something better. Amazon of course lived upto their rep. I got the order quickly and had I chose to return the item I'm sure they would have been helpful as always.
customer_reviews.author: hopetobeoneday

customer_reviews.title: Great for home with several wifi connections
customer_reviews.text: We currently have one so ordered another one for my father in law. Great for home with several wifi connections.
customer_reviews.author: debbylariv

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working great. I replaced my old router because I kept loosing connection on my laptop and tv. I have cable tv and internet through my local telephone co. I was not sure which router to buy that would work with my cable company hookup so after reading lots of reviews on different routers, I chose this one. I have netflix and amazon and do not have the constant loading problem I had before. Covers from one end of house to the other and even outside storage shed where I sometimes use my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma B.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I should of went with enterprise routers, but that would be overkill on the radiation emitting everywhere. This is good broadcast in both 2.4 and 5. And cheap too.
customer_reviews.author: cmf

customer_reviews.title: Makes me happy
customer_reviews.text: My other router was old and not as secure as I liked. When I seen the Vizio was on sale I was unfamiliar with it so I asked my son and he looked into it and said it was a good deal and good product and to get him one too, for that price. It improved the internet speed a lot and the security features are very good. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: incredible product
customer_reviews.text: i installed this in less than 10 minutes including hooking in my wii laptop and a hardwire to my desktop an additional minute or two to tie in the kids ds etc the quality is perfect i stream netflix to my wii and that also is the greatest invention ever
customer_reviews.author: hooterwah

customer_reviews.title: Works great (for about one month)
customer_reviews.text: This router was very easy to set up and worked great for a little over a month. It started needing to be reset at least twice a week right after the Amazon return window closed. It would not work for more than two days with the 5ghz and 2.4ghz channels set. I disabled the 5ghz and it worked fine for two weeks. Amazon would not allow the return unless I paid the freight. Do yourself a favor and buy your router at Costco. They will take it back no questions asked. I have been an Amazon customer for years and my wife and I own 3 kindles. I am very disappointed in Vizio and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: bnjdavid

customer_reviews.title: Wow! works fast! and great.....
customer_reviews.text: I'm on it now...it works great! upstairs downstairs...the range is great and I do not lose connection....it's not juse for a Vizio with apps....it for wireless connection to laptops/notebooks ect ect ect....great router!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This product was relatively simple to install and it has not given my any problems since installation. Its operational range is not as much as I hoped, but that is not a major issue.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Schutz

customer_reviews.title: Streaming.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product to stream Netflix, found out I don't have enough signal strength with hughes net so its just sitting on the shelf until I can get cable.
customer_reviews.author: thomas n. moore

customer_reviews.title: Vizio router after one month review
customer_reviews.text: I have had my Vizio router for about one month. The router was easy to set up. I hooked up my printer and my Roku wireless with no problums. My Roku is running on the higher bandwith and seems to be fine. I bought this due to the price compared to higher prices from their compation. I have been completly satisfied with my purchase and would recommend to other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This wireless router is exactly what I needed.  I handle several computers and other devices with no problem. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a router that could handle several computers and other devices with no problem. The VIZIO Router was able to do exactly what I needed it to do and then some.
customer_reviews.author: burtonbs

customer_reviews.title: love It
customer_reviews.text: This has been a god sent router.Flawless. Never a problem. I think that its been over two years.I hope that this doe's not jink it. But if it stop working I'm buying another one of the same.
customer_reviews.author: Pure Mood

customer_reviews.title: Vizio ROCKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: GET ONE, THE PRICE IS RIGHT WORKS GREAT WITH MY SYSTEM, the only thing you have to do is change the pass key during set up, it will save you tons of frustration, love it, LOVE LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia J. Michels

customer_reviews.title: Great Router
customer_reviews.text: We have bought two of these so far, one for ourselves and one for Mom and Dad. Easy to use, streams wonderfully, no problems and I have had it over a year. Nice price too.
customer_reviews.author: Morlissa&Deane

customer_reviews.title: Internet goes off and on.
customer_reviews.text: Un usable router, was very happy with the speed but the signal was real bad with both bands and also the router stopped working after about 3 days. Wouldn't recommend it. Very easy to set up though.
customer_reviews.author: AirForcepj1

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice cheap alternative
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, traveling and want to be able to have this with me so I can connect into the internet and have it wireless wherever I am. This is a nice cheap alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Conrod

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Really nice wireless router. Comes with 5GHZ for HD streaming, and downloading. Easy to set up. Way better than my old router.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Vizio
customer_reviews.text: Vizio makes a great router. This is the second one that I have bought. It is better than most routers that I have had. I will buy more
customer_reviews.author: Edward Walden

customer_reviews.title: not so good
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about a year, then it started to quit. I kept unplugging and restarting it, and it finally got a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Revfiddle

customer_reviews.title: Vizio XWR100 Dual-Band HD Wireless Internet Router
customer_reviews.text: I am not a computer whiz. I have tried hooking up other routers in the past, but have had issues and could not get them to work properly. I am not a patient person. This router had very clear and precise directions which allowed me to set it up and have it working within minutes. Surprisingly, I found it not only worked on my first floor level, but also on the far side of the house, in the basement. No issues at all. I ordered it from Amazon and received it within the prescribed time.
customer_reviews.author: pebaker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I read most of the reviews before purchasing this product. It seemed to work pretty well for a week or so, but lately it has been locking up, transferring data very slowly, and generally being a PITA. At first I thought it might be my computer, but I decided to try my old G router to make sure. I can't believe the difference. The Vizio XWR100 doesn't hold a candle to my old router. So, I'm very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: overthehump

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This unit worked great for about a year and a half with no troubles. Then had to reset it. Not bad.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Meets all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Vizio XWR-100 dual band HD wireless Internet router from Amazon to replace an older router that caused my Netflix to re-buffer several times during a movie. The price was right and I got very quick delivery. The router installation was a breeze and WiFi reception on my BlueRay player and TV improved such that I not longer have re-buffering problems.I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Vizio Router
customer_reviews.text: This router works great. It was easy to install and password protect. It covers our whole home and guests when they visit.
customer_reviews.author: Mommo

customer_reviews.title: complicated but works well
customer_reviews.text: a bit tricky to set up but works well through out whole house. Works especially good on laptops but not so good on desk tops. Might just be my e-machine desk top.
customer_reviews.author: eric lutz

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I WOULD SUGGEST ANYONE LOOKING FOR A WIFI CONNECTION PURCHASE ONE FROM VIZIO AS IT WORKS FLAWLESSLY HOOK IT UP AND FORGET IT.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hallenus Sr.

customer_reviews.title: It's OK...
customer_reviews.text: Range is not great and it drops a lot, needing me to reset the router. The controls/options for the router in the customization menu are solid enough and the dual-band does work. I just needed a new router with better range and this wasn't the one for my house. For the price point however, it isn't a bad deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Results
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second one I purchased. The first one worked great. Setup was easy and it is rock solid. I liked the first one so much I bought another for my parents for Christmas... Unfortunately the second is exactly the opposite... Had a hard time getting it to work (all of a sudden it started) and now it keeps needings reset constantly. I havent given up on it (only because I liked the first one so much) but at this point we went back to the old one...
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Wireless router
customer_reviews.text: Very good item and it worked very well. I would recommend it to anyone who needs a good, reliable router.
customer_reviews.author: R. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Vizio XWR100 Router
customer_reviews.text: Great router for the price. Very easy setup. The dual band is great for all the new devices & most old devices. Has great reception & can handle everything i need it to at once. The only problem i have with this product is that it is not backwards compatible & so will not support the Nintendo Wii. This is the only reason I give it a 4 rating. Otherwise, this is great product for price (esp. @ Amazon)& you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: bramy

customer_reviews.title: Very good router
customer_reviews.text: My father bought one over a year ago and I was so happy with how it performed I bought one! Love this router, easy to configure and setup and the price was good too.
customer_reviews.author: David Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I've had Vizio wireless internet router for about year now. It works great! I use it for my two laptops, one desktop computer, my ps3 and two xbox 360. I haven't had an problem with it. Every three month I have to reset it. I'm not sure if it the router or my internet provider. Overall, you should buy this product if you need a wireless router. Also, it was a quick and easy delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn1111

customer_reviews.title: Poor Transmisson Range
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old Netgear router that I've had for years, still ran without problems. I wanted a faster router to stream to my TV. The signal strength is poor, it went from the high 90% (95-100) with the old Netgear to the low 30% (32-37) with the Vizio. Being less than 20 feet away I would expect a lot stronger signal. I don't know if I'm getting the through put for streaming that I expected, it may not be as good as my old router. My laptop also gets poor signal strength.
customer_reviews.author: D B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: The Vizio was delivered quickly and has met my needs. It was very easy to setup. There are not a lot of bells and whistles, but it does it's job well. I would recommend to anyone who doesn't want to customize every setting.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 0

customer_reviews.title: Vizio Router
customer_reviews.text: The Vizio router was just what we needed - simple to install, working as advertised, and at a very reasonable price. My wife and I are not very computer-literate, so the ease of installation was especially appreciated. The router has worked well in our four-level home. The encryption-enabled router also gives us peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Very good router !
customer_reviews.text: This router replaced D-Link DIR-655 and right away I stopped loosing connection once every 20 min or so. Set up was a breeze. Also coverage is greater since my Samsung led tv has no problem connect to it and stay connected .
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Very good router
customer_reviews.text: With my old Belkin I was constantly unplugging it and plugging it back in, not with this one. I use it for streaming movies on my blu ray player. It works flawlessly. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: vizio dual band hd wireless internet router
customer_reviews.text: The Vizio router is as described, works perfect with the visio smart TV I purchased. Would recommend and will buy again if needed. thanks Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Virginia A. Dial

customer_reviews.title: Vizio Router
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, received in very short time, exactly as described. Liked it so much I ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. A little older model, but works great for my home usage. No complaints nor regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Jairus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works just as it should. I bought this 2 years ago and it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Jherica Allen

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest thing on its type I have ever set up and on top of that has the best user interface I have seen on a router. very nice. Looks great also! I have had no issues in speed using this router and have not had to do any recycling sense I set it up the first time. My only issue is that for some reason my password didn't like to connect items. I'm not sure what was going on there but it was easily resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: it Didn't work and do what it said it would do in terms of speed false advertising, a piece of junk. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A. Magnello

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great router & very easy to setup!
customer_reviews.author: joseph c somers

customer_reviews.title: Go back to the drawing board
customer_reviews.text: This router does not work and it is a very poor excuse for a wireless router. Vizio make nice decent TVs and reasonably price Blu-Rays. But they should stay out of the wireless router market.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: HD Wifi
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for the 6 HD devices to use. The laptops use the other channel and this router does and excellent job keeping all these devices connected. Even the wifi printer issue we had before was resolved with this router.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne65

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it...
customer_reviews.text: It has to be reset almost daily. No customer service, online or by phone. I sent mine back. I bought the: Medialink - Wireless N Broadband Router - 150 Mbps - 2.4GHz - 802.11n w/ Internal Antenna, from Amazon for the same price and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: paul b anderson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great unit! Easy to get setup and quality speed ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit! Easy to get setup and quality speed for your network. I'll keep this one for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this for 3 months now and am happy with it. No complains, was easy to set-up. Have 2 laptops, a printer, an ipod and ps3 connected wirelessly
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Vizio Router
customer_reviews.text: This router performs well and has three different options for the setup, which is very versatil and esay to hookup/
customer_reviews.author: Cdanstevens

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest router to set up that I have ever used. it was up and running in less than 5 minutes including security code changes. I do recommend this router.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown but by God

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an older router that routinely needed resetting. This unit was simple to install and has provided excellent speed and range since installation. I welcome not having to reset my router 3 to 4 times per week.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: I have given up!
customer_reviews.text: The set up was not as easy as I thought it would. Instructions need some clarification. But once I got it running, I have been pleased with the speed, networking ability and flexibility. Follow up: I get a dropped wireless connection every other day requiring a power cycle. This is a common problem described in the one star reviews. I will be buying a netgear router.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick E. Dennstedt

product_meta.title: VIZIO XWR100 Dual-Band HD Wireless Internet Router
product_meta.description:
Wirelessly stream HD movies, TV shows, music and more right to your Internet HDTV with the VIZIO XWR100 Dual-Band HD Wireless Internet Router. Optimized for VIZIO Internet Apps and ideal for online HD video and audio, the XWR100 features simultaneous dual-band 802.11n wireless for the best performance and compatibility.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: 802.11n simultaneous dual-band wireless networking operates at both 2.4GHz and 5 GHz
Optimized for VIA HDTVs and Blu-ray Players
Ideal for streaming HD video and audio with maximum range and speed.
Integrated 4 port 10/100 switch connects up to 4 wired Internet devices, like DVRs and computers
USB 2.0 port lets you connect a USB hard drive for shared access to photos, videos and more

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars326 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
